name: Populous & the Promised Lands
overview: This compilation contains: Populous (base game) Populous: The Promised Lands (expansion). Populous: You play a god, gaming against other gods in a celestial game of conquest. To win, you must help your chosen people take over the world and wipe out the vermin who worship that other god. Populous: The Promised Lands:This Data Disk for Populous adds five new landscape types: Wild West, Silly Land, Block Land, Révolution Française and Bit Plains. The types can be used to create new maps in Paint Map mode and the disk also has 500 new maps for Conquest mode.
